summary:
Pink Queen of Memes – $PEPI – Pepe’s True Love - The Hottest Frog Token on the Ethereum Blockchain

 Relaunch Coming Soon! - The Team is reviewing the contract and making final decisions and testing.

 Relaunch Announcement - SPECIAL ANNOUNCEMENT WHEN PEPI WAS LAUNCHED, IT WAS DONE BY A DEV THAT DIDN'T CARE ABOUT THE...

 Pepi’s Mission - Pepi is a Community run token with the mission to expand awareness to women in the crypto space. She supports all of her frog family crypto projects and aims to empower women all over the world. She will be featuring content that will expose their work to our community and beyond. Pepi Family and Team is fully committed to this vision and the journey through the market cycles and sustain support for many years to come. She is a safe token to buy and sell on Uniswap.
